description:
He`s a DC scientist. He`s the creator of School, and one of the chosen few selected for the Earth Cradle. He created the Machinery Children in an attempt at creating a more advanced human, and had them act as guardians for the Earth Cradle.
During the decisive battle at the Earth Cradle, he piloted a Bergelmir, though Wodan and his Thrudgelmir defeated him by self destructing.
name: Eagreat Fehu
